meanings.definition: A small bag or pouch used for carrying money and small personal items.
meanings.sent1: She kept her coins and keys in her pocketbooks.
meanings.sent2: He always carries his important documents in his pocketbooks.
meanings.sent3: The pocketbooks were so full, they could barely close!
meanings.sent4: Her pocketbooks were like tiny treasure chests holding her valuables.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pocketbooks jingled as she walked, a symphony of small items.

meanings.definition: A book small enough to be carried in a pocket, especially a paperback novel.
meanings.sent1: He enjoyed reading pocketbooks during his commute.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pocketbook to read on the plane.
meanings.sent3: The pocketbook was so engaging, she finished it in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: His pocketbook was a portal to different worlds and adventures.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out pocketbook held stories that touched his heart.

meanings.sent1: She carried her essentials in her stylish pocketbooks.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite pocketbook matched her outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The pocketbook seemed to have a mind of its own, hiding things inside.
meanings.sent4: Her pocketbook was her trusted companion wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The elegant pocketbook added a touch of sophistication to her look.
